Text: V is ok but wtf is the sound ?

Video quality is not too bad but the audio is very bad.

Bad in that the audio is so low even with 400% noise amplification in ffdshow audio decoder it still has a lot of noise and even using a noise filter it just makes the audio harder to hear.
Useless audio, even with noise reduction. gating and EQ.

@ProphetZarquon 

Pretty much right on the money about the audio. You could do a ton of audio tweaking and it won't do any good until someone actually does a proper cam rip in the USA on or after May 3rd.
